Title: Zoey 1 Seater Sofa in Dark Walnut colour

Details.Dimensions:: H 31.1 x  W 25.19 x  D 30.7; Seating Height:17.32

Description: Nilkamal, the most established brands known amongst masses, offering affordable and durable lifestyle furniture for your home and personal space. Available in variety of colours and designs; these not only bring appeal to your living space but also provide you with best in style and durability. Modern Style Sofas usually come in fixed back with cushions attached to the frame. They mostly come with minimal details & compact proportions. These sofas can be with or without arms.
